static void RegisterParser (AbstractIMelodyParser *parser)
 Registers a parser to decode an i-melody.

Detailed Description

Obsolete - all sound classes from AddOns/MultiMedia have been replaced by a new audio concept. Use the AudioDeviceManager instead for playing sounds.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IMelody::IMelody (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

IMelody::IMelody (  BinData *  bin_data,
BOOLEAN  copyrighted = FALSE
)  [explicit]
 

Initializes an i-melody-object with the given bin_data.

Parameters:
bin_data Pointer to a binary data stream which contains the i-melody data. After passing the binary data stream, the stream is obtained by the i-melody-object and hence automatically released in the destructor of the i-melody-object.
copyrighted Indicates, whether the melody is copyrighted.

IMelody::~IMelody (   )  [virtual]

BinData* IMelody::GetPlainData (   )  [inline]
 

Obsolete (provided for backward-compatibility with APOXI-1.6.3) - use GetBinData instead. It is strongly recommend not to change the content of bin-data, because the i-melody-object is owner of the bin-data by definition (see APOXI_GUI_Tutorial for further details).
